code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Api(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const[page,setPage]=useState(1);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos?_page=".concat(page,"&_limit=10")).then(response=>setTodos(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[page]);const handlePreviousPage=()=>{if(page>1){setPage(page-1);}};const handleNextPage=()=>{setPage(page+1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card text-center mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"card-title",children:"Tp api axios"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:todo.title},todo.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary mr-2",onClick:handlePreviousPage,disabled:page===1,children:"Pr\xE9c\xE9dent"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleNextPage,children:"Suivant"})]})]})});}export default Api;
